title: F5 Support Knowledge Base - Recent Additions and Updates
description: Whether you have a specific technical question about an F5 product or you simply want general information about F5 solutions and services, the Ask F5 online database has the answer. Our RSS feeds are updated daily.

entries.title: K000141008: RADIUS authentication vulnerability CVE-2024-3596
entries.summary: Security Advisory Description RADIUS Protocol under RFC 2865 is susceptible to forgery attacks by a local attacker who can modify any valid Response (Access-Accept, Access-Reject, or Access- ...

entries.title: K000151819: PowerDNS vulnerability CVE-2018-16855
entries.summary: Security Advisory Description An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor before version 4.1.8 where a remote attacker sending a DNS query can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read while computing ...

entries.title: K000141463: Angular JS vulnerabilities CVE-2019-10768 and CVE-2023-26116
entries.summary: Security Advisory Description CVE-2019-10768 In AngularJS before 1.7.9 the function `merge()` could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of `Object.prototype` using a `__proto__` payload.
entries.description: Security Advisory Description CVE-2019-10768 In AngularJS before 1.7.9 the function `merge()` could be tricked into adding or modifying properties of `Object.prototype` using a `__proto__` payload.

entries.title: K000139594: libxml2 vulnerability CVE-2022-40304
entries.summary: Security Advisory Description An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. Certain invalid XML entity definitions can corrupt a hash table key, potentially leading to subsequent logic errors.
entries.description: Security Advisory Description An issue was discovered in libxml2 before 2.10.3. Certain invalid XML entity definitions can corrupt a hash table key, potentially leading to subsequent logic errors.

entries.title: K000151516: Python urllib vulnerability CVE-2019-9947
